mapper.select: SELECT r.restaurant_name AS restaurantName, COUNT(re.report_code) AS reportCount FROM restaurant r INNER JOIN report re ON re.restaurant_code = r.restaurant_code INNER JOIN restaurant_blacklist rb ON rb.report_code = re.report_code WHERE r.restaurant_is_deleted = FALSE GROUP BY r.restaurant_name ORDER BY MAX(rb.restaurant_blacklist_created_at) DESC
